«Minesweeper» – simple game that, nevertheless, develops attention, memory and logic.

Its main goal — find all cells without mines and open them. You need to be very careful: as soon as you open the cage under which the mine is hidden, the game is over. Minesweeper makes a mistake only once.

Field

The field is divided into adjacent cells, some of which are "mined".
The player must open the cells, trying not to open the cell with a mine (by opening the cell with a mine, he loses).
Mines are placed after the first move, so it’s impossible to lose on the first move..

Cells

If there is no mine under the open cell, then a number appears in it indicating how many mines are hidden around this cell (this number will help you understand where the safe cells are and where the bombs are).
If there are no mines under the neighboring cells too, then a certain “non-mined” area opens up to cells that contain numbers.
You have not been in the game for a long time. We need you!
